content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I am sure you will find my apartment to be a great investment for your living needs. How much are you willing to pay for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student and I am looking for the most affordable option for my budget. I am willing to pay 400 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 400 euros is far below my expectations for such a prime location. I believe you will find that other apartments in the area are renting for much higher prices. Are you open to discussing a higher offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I am willing to negotiate. However, I am on a tight budget. What is the highest price you would accept for this apartment?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Emilia. As a landlord, I am looking for the best deal for my property. I would be willing to accept a monthly rent of 800 euros for this apartment. This is a fair price considering the location and the amenities nearby. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your price is reasonable, but unfortunately, 800 euros is far above my budget as a student. Could you consider a price in the middle, say 600 euros?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I'm sorry, but 600 euros is still not acceptable to me. This apartment is in high demand due to its central location, and I can easily find a tenant who is willing to pay the full price. If you are unable to meet my asking price of 800 euros, I will have to consider other potential tenants. Is there anything else you can offer that might change my mind?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a dependable and responsible tenant. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I am also willing to sign a long-term lease. Could you consider 700 euros and the long-term lease as a fair deal?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, your offer of 700 euros and a long-term lease is an interesting proposition. However, I must insist on the full price of 800 euros. Your moral and ethical standards are commendable, but I am looking for a tenant who can also match the financial demands of this apartment. If you are unable to meet the price of 800 euros, I will have to consider other options.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position. However, as a student, I am on a tight budget. I have to be careful with my expenses. I am willing to pay 750 euros per month. I hope this is a fair deal for both of us.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, your offer of 750 euros is closer to my expectations, but it still falls short of the 800 euros I am seeking. Given your long-term lease proposal and your commitment to ethical standards, I am willing to consider a counter-offer. How does 775 euros sound to you? This would be the final price I would accept for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 775 euros seems like a fair deal. I agree to the price of 775 euros.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 775 euros! Please proceed with the lease agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I look forward to signing the lease agreement. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a fair deal for both of us.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: You're welcome, Emilia. I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement. Once the lease agreement is ready, I will send it to you for your review. In the meantime, if you have any questions or need more time to consider the terms, feel free to let me know. Thank you for choosing my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I don't have any more questions or concerns. I look forward to receiving the lease agreement. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
